summary:
Steve Ramsey       
CAREER OBJECTIVE
Highly skilled registered sonographer with 40 years’ experience seeks leading/ teaching position performing MSK- joints, and General medical US.
CORE QUALIFICATIONS
•	Experience leveraging strong communications and interpersonal skills to greet and calm patients, explain procedures, acquire medical histories, and ensure positive patient experiences.
•	Well-versed in use of Color Doppler, Power Doppler, Spectral Doppler, Harmonics, and other Ultrasonography technologies.
•	Current AHA Basic Life Support (BLS) certification and American Registry of Diagnostic Medical Sonographer (RDMS), RMSKS, membership. Sonography Canada , and ACMDTT qualifications and registry.
•	
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
ADC medical Imaging, Calgary, Alberta .2013 to present
Perform general MSK, General sonography, Small parts, Carotids, Legs and Arms DVT scan, and pediatrics, Assess patients to determine appropriate diagnostic protocols. Create, fine-tune, and label ultrasound images.
•	Served on collaborative, cross-functional team tasked with PAC system.
•	Worked in North and south Ontario –Canada, Saskatoon, and North Alberta, from 1984 until now. Also worked overseas in Iraq, Saudi. and Brunie
•	I was a senior sonographer working for the royal Jerudong park medical centre in South East Asia- Brunei from 1994 to 1999.

EDUCATION
PhD- Public Health- USA
-	MSC Degree in Medical Ultrasound (hon); (2005) 
Charles sturt university –Australia

-	BSc in Diagnostic Imaging; (2001)
                      Charles sturt university –Australia
-	Diploma in radiography from Fanshawe College, London Ontario
 (1984) 
                 -   & diploma in Sonography
                     Health science centre in Winnipeg, Manitoba (1985)
Done all the 14 courses and diplomas with Burwins Institutes of medical sonography in Manitoba.
PgD- Diploma in Natural Health.
BSc in Medicine- MD,  Aristotle University of Thessaloniki- Greece 1974- 1979. Worked with the red cross hospital. Moved to Canada in my last year of residency 1979 .
Awards
The Excellence award in sonography, 3rd place with Sonography Canada it was awarded for my MSc thesis research in the discovery of new fetal measurement. 2005.
Attended most of Sonography Canada- CSDMS, ACMDTT, and the SDMS conventions for sonographers 
I am also open to work as a public health officer, director, assistant director of public health. Ultrasound instructor in Dubai, UAE, Middleast, and South East Asia.
fullName: Dr.Steve Ramsey, PhD MSc-(hon) in Med Ultrasound.RMSKS.

publications.description: 1- Cystic teratoma - dermoid sidedness published with JSDMS - usa. 2- uterine malformation in restricted gene pool community also published with JSDMS. 3- APTD new discovery of new fetal measurement my master degree thesis  published with JSDMS -USA. 4- many other ultrasound research papers were published in Italy, UK, South Korea, Japan, and  Oman .  please see my blog for more info at www.moleopedia.com  under ultrasound section

message.text:
For those who want to pass the ARDMS exam you can buy my exam questions and answers sets , very affordable at least 3000 each set.
abdominal and small parts,plus OBS and Gyn all go together  = 100 US dollars. 
cardio vascualr set all go togather= 100 US $
MSK set 100 US $.
let me know so I can send you more info.
Steve 
drsteveramsey@gmail.com

Students emotion and education; I will Acknowledge thier feeling , and make them feel that they have got the attention and my focus . Encourage healthy emotions, teaching them how to harnest the positive emotion with the help of profissionals . provide structure and consistency, assurance and support.
Teach them about hope, care, kindness, and let them feel that they are not alone.
let them work as a team . Ask if it is a family problem, medical problme , fnacial problme and give them the tool to work on each of the problem. connect them with the right departments and profissionals . 
use songs, muscis, color and other means to make them remeber things .focus on mental health,and team health, and that emotion is very important in education.

If the company make a new demand - make sure that you have a policy, procedures and protocol and the new demand does-not harm the patients, clients, customer and jeopardise thier confidentaility, privacey and security,Then ask for  a meeting with the mnager, supoervisors and the director to discusss the breech of all that,  and ask for correction. 

The new demand must go thorw the normal channel so that everybody can contribute and undertsand the positive impact of the new demand.

It must not break the labour code, ethical code, and allign with the goul vesion, and mission of the company. The new demand must not be in a form of harressment . 
Is it a chivebale in the time frame? Is it for short tearm? Does it benafits the company and your clients ? Suggest alteration and moduifcations, and be part of the soultion to evolve it to more productive form.

Great job as this also will push on the nearby sciatic nerve

Before you start asking for promotion, ask your selfe this question,Do i really desrve it? then are you ready for the responsibilty that might come with it? is your age and other activities will able you to put 100% toeard this achievemne? 
secondly you should seek advise and input from your friends, colleagues and make sure that you do not ask any body, ask only those who your trust and wise, and those who are not jelaous from you.
ask you junior supervisors regarding your strength and weakness and how to improve them.
thirdley you have to ask your self and those who they know your work about your sutibility for the new role.
You can also try to take some leadership,and  management cources that help your new role.
